links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: composite[n_Integer] := Block[{k=n+PrimePi[n]+1}, While[k-PrimePi[k]-1 != n, k++]; k]; Table[Prime[n] - composite[n], {n,65}]Module[{nn=300,prs,cmps,len},prs=Prime[Range[PrimePi[nn]]];cmps= Complement[ Range[4,nn],prs];len=Min[Length[prs],Length[cmps]]; #[[1]]- #[[2]]&/@ Thread[{Take[prs,len],Take[cmps,len]}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 18 2015 *)
prog: (Haskell)a038529 n = a000040 n - a002808 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 30 2014
author: Vasiliy Danilov (danilovv(AT)usa.net) 1998 Jul
extensions: Mathematica program corrected by Harvey P. Dale, Aug 08 2011
